issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

comments.body:
Hello, 

I tried to find a solution on this issue, No straight forward solution though. Here is a [Tidev|http://www.tidev.io/2015/01/12/how-to-try-the-titanium-windows-platform-preview-for-free/] link, Where in the comment section Marc Bender and Fokke Zandbergen discuss on this issue. Follow there conversation. 

Hope this helps. Thanks.
Hello, You can try updating the CLI and SDK. Sometimes when you automatically update a SDK. It causes problem. Try manually downloading a SDK and install it.
